API_Description: Runs a Preflight profile for the document. An exception is thrown if the Preflight run fails.

oProfile.description: The Preflight profile to be used for the Preflight run, described by a PreflightProfile object.

bOmitFixups.description: (optional) Omit all fixups in the Preflight profile. If bOmitFixups is not specified, false is used.

oThermometer.description: (optional) Show the status window and progress bar that indicates to the user that a lengthy operation is in progress. To acquire a Thermometer object, use app.thermometer. If oThermometer is not specified, no progress is shown.
